subject: Re: [junit] XML Unit's funny problem: Help needed
msgSnippet: ... The Swing UI s TestRunner uses run(Class test), rather than run(Test test). Try: new junit.swingui.TestRunner().run(test_XMLTestCase.class); Mike -- Mike
messageBody:
"pragnesh.p" wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I have been asked to do some exploration on JUnit. I have finished exploration of JUnit and JUnitPerf and am currently exploring XmlUnit.
> There is a funny problem which i am facing currently. When I compile test_XMLTestCase.java (a sample file given) with
>
> public static void main(String[] args) {
> (new junit.textui.TestRunner()).run(suite());
> }
>
> it compiles and runs without any problems.
> However when i do the following change
>
> public static void main(String[] args) {
> (new junit.swingui.TestRunner()).run(suite());
> }
>
> It gives following error:
>
> test_XMLTestCase.java:297: cannot resolve symbol
> symbol : method run (junit.framework.TestSuite)
> location: class junit.swingui.TestRunner
> (new junit.swingui.TestRunner()).run(suite());
> ^
> 1 error
>
> Does any one have an idea of watz happening.
>

The Swing UI's TestRunner uses run(Class test), rather than run(Test test).

Try:

new junit.swingui.TestRunner().run(test_XMLTestCase.class);


Mike

--
Mike Clark
